entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow after midnight. Local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
